Package jcurses.widgets

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IScrollable
    This interface is to be implemented by widgets, that use ScrollbarPainter to paint vertical or horizontal (or both ) scrollbars.
    JCursesFileFilterFactory  
    WidgetsConstants  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BorderLayoutManager
    This class is a layout manager that works like Swing's BorderLayout.
    BorderPanel
    This class implements a panel with a border.
    Button
    This class implements a buttton-widget.
    CheckBox
    This class implements a checkbox widget.
    DefaultFileFilterFactory  
    DefaultLayoutManager
    This is a default layout manager.
    Dialog
    This class implements a modal dialog.
    FileDialog
    This class implements a file select dialog
    Grid  
    GridLayoutManager
    This class is a layout manager that works like as the DefaultLayoutManager with an difference: the painting rectangle is shared in many grid cells and the constraints are stated not in real coodinates on the painting rectangle, but in 'grid-coordinates'
    Label
    This class implements a label widget
    LayoutConstraint
    The base class of GridLayoutConstraint, BorderLayoutConstraint and DefaultLayoutConstraint
    LayoutManager
    This interface must be implemented bei layout managers, that layout widgets within widget containers.
    List  
    MenuList  
    Panel
    This class implements a panel container for widgets.
    PasswordField
    Title: JCurses Description:
    PopUpList
    This class implements a popup list.
    PopUpMenu
    This class implements a popup menu window.
    RadioButton  
    ScrollbarPainter
    This class is used by widgets, having scrollable content, to paint scrollbars.
    TextArea
    This class implements a text area to edit a text with meny lines
    TextComponent
    The class is the superclass for text editing widgets
    TextField
    This class implements a input text field to edie a one line text.
    ToggleButton
    The base class of RadioButton and CheckBox
    ToggleButtonGroup
    This class is a set of ToggleButton Only one ToggleButton in this group can be selected
    Widget
    This class is superclass for all jcurses widgets.
    WidgetContainer
    This class is a superclass for widget containers, that is, for widgets, that can contain other widgets
    WidgetUtilities
    WidgetUtilities contains utility methods for the jcurses library.
    Window
    This class is a jcurses implementation of an text based window.
